name: Andrélon Special conditioner kokos boost
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Cocos Nucifera Fruit Extract (Kokosmelk), Bambusa Vulgaris Shoot (Bamboe) Extract, Parfum, Sine Adipe Lac, Dipropylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Coumarin, Linalool.
